summary: Breton RaceMenu preset based on TiaBlackRaven's original Character for Jade's Court.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]My First Mod!!

Well, technically this isn's a mod, but a simple RaceMenu preset, based on the Breton race and inspired by Serpentine, an Original Character developed by [size=3][size=3] [url=https://tiablackraven.deviantart.com/]TiaBlackRaven[/url][/size][/size] for [url=https://jades-court.deviantart.com]Jades-Court[/url]. Jade's Court is a Deviantart group devoted to Gems OC, inspired by the lore of Steven Universe.

I had a special affection for Tia's character and after a few brainstorming with her, I decided to re-create Serpentine in Skyrim, as a playable character. I'm aware  that this preset isn't on the same level of other, but it was intended mainly as a small gift for my friend. I don't expect many downloads.[/size]

[img]https://img00.deviantart.net/e182/i/2018/030/0/6/jade_s_court__serpentine_application_by_tiablackraven-dabmkey.jpg[/img]
©2016-2018 [url=https://tiablackraven.deviantart.com/]TiaBlackRaven
[/url]
[size=3]Suggested Mods:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27060]Demon Hunter Armor - CBBEv3 and UNP[/url]﻿ by jmenaru  (used in screenshots, not included)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27536]Noldorian Huntress - a re-texture of the Demon Hunter Armor[/url]﻿ by EcthelionOtW (used in screenshots, not included)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644]Immersive Weapons[/url]﻿ by hothtrooper44 (Justicar Saber used in screenshots, not included)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30132]Bears Mounts and Followers[/url]﻿ by gg77  (used in screenshots, not included)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49292]Kankaraya[/url]﻿ by KANRAx2 (location and 'torch' used in screenshots, not included)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57050]tumbajamba's mounts[/url]﻿ by  tumbajamba (used in screenshots, not included)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31204]New Scarves of Skyrim[/url]﻿ by jacknifelee [size=3](used in screenshots, not included)[/size] [/size]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14387]New Unarmed Hand to Hand Skill[/url]﻿ by Budcat [/size]
[/list]
[size=3]ENB used: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15425]Stakado cinemascope ENB[/url] (sightly modified to remove the black bars)[/size]
author: Leavhon and TiaBlackraven
